segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I see the woman focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, sink full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle grows under her foot unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's waiting for a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back on the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the stoolâ€” is it really tipping?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, and the overflow; that's unexpected too.
segments.speaker: PAR
